entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 80 gusting to 110 this evening. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 80 km/h gusting to 110 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
